Make Your Next Career Move

Drivers and Owner Operators: We Want You

Put yourself in the driver’s seat of your career with Cusmir Express. Join our rapidly growing team of transportation experts. We have various open positions and we’re always looking for the best of the best.

With Cusmir Express you will get the desired amount of miles as we move freight 24 hours a day, 365 days a year from and to any point within the United States (48 States).

Aside from this, we put together the most qualified team for each transportation service. With a fleet of nearly {{number of trucks]}, Cusmir Express will help you create your own success.

With Cusmir Express You Can Get:
  • Best rates on Market
  • Home time
  • Flexible scheduling & reliable equipment
  • No force dispatch
  • New equipment
  • Great pay
Apply Now
Driver Qualification Requirements:
  • Must be at least 23 years old
  • Must possess a class A CDL
  • Must have one year of experience
  • No DUI, reckless or unsafe driving violations
  • All applicants will be subjected to a background check
